NAICS Translation: 325188: All Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Agency: New York Department of Environmental Conservation

Description: SI Group agreed to pay $400,000 in settlement of allegations it violated the Clean Air Act when an improperly operated emission control device allowed alkyl phenol compounds into the air, failed to properly measure and report emissions, and failed to properly manage hazardous waste.
